destination.description: Address of an account to receive any leftover XRP after deleting the sending account. Must be a funded account in the ledger, and must not be the sending account.

destinationTag.description: (Optional) Arbitrary destination tag that identifies a hosted recipient or other information for the recipient of the deleted account's leftover XRP.

destinationXAddress.description: X-address of an account to receive any leftover XRP after deleting the sending account. Must be a funded account in the ledger, and must not be the sending account.
